channel.title: Simple syntax question [z508]
channel.description:
Hey guys, could someone give me the syntax in order for NPCList and NPCSpawn? NPCList:
npc = 1 2 10000 1 2 0 30 60 0 Human Some_human.
NPCSpawn:
spawn = 6538 3187 3693 -8 4 0 0 0 0 Bh banker
Syntax meaning the order of what the numbers mean. Thanks.
